verbs.description: In the wake of [ARG1: Michelle Wolf ’s] [ARGM-MNR: savage] [V: set] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] , President Trump called for the cancellation of the White House Correspondents’ Dinner .
[ARGM-TMP: In the wake of Michelle Wolf ’s savage set on Saturday] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: called] [ARG1: for the cancellation of the White House Correspondents’ Dinner] .
